br.com.caelum.vraptor.restfulie.serialization

Class RestfulSerializationJSON

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.caelum.vraptor.serialization.xstream.XStreamJSONSerialization
      • br.com.caelum.vraptor.restfulie.serialization.RestfulSerializationJSON
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JSONSerialization, NoRootSerialization, Serialization, View

    @Component
@RequestScoped
public class RestfulSerializationJSON
extends XStreamJSONSerialization
    Custom serialization process provides a way to add links to your resource representations.
    Author:
    guilherme silveira, ac de souza

      • getXStream

        protected com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream getXStream()
        You can override this method for configuring XStream before serialization. It configures the xstream instance with a link converter for all StateResource implementations.

        getXStream in class XStreamJSONSerialization
        Returns:
        a configured instance of xstream
